response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and growth. Given its exceptional value and potential impact on your endeavors, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a unique chance to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate, considering its intrinsic worth to you is $1,200,000. We are confident that this investment will prove highly beneficial for your company's future success. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
